description: This Python script demonstrates how to access and print reasoning content from an agent in a reasoning system, including examples with streaming and non-streaming responses, and with different reasoning models.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of performing reasoning tasks, executing prompts, and managing reasoning content.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt and returns a response object.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent, optionally streaming the output.
